import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import { withRouter, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "unistore/react"; import { actions } from "../store/store"; import '../style/bootstrap.min.css' import '../style/recipe.css' class Recipe extends React.Component{ componentDidMount = async () => { const index = await this.props.match.params.index; const listRecipe = await this.props.listRecipe; const currentRecipe = listRecipe[index]; await this.props.setChange('recipeData', currentRecipe) } render() { const recipe = this.props.recipeData let recipeDetail; if(recipe!==undefined){ recipeDetail = recipe.recipe console.log(recipeDetail) } return(
{recipeDetail!==undefined?
favorite share thumb_down

{recipeDetail.label}


Calories

{Math.round(recipeDetail.calories)}kcal

Total Fat

{Math.round(recipeDetail.totalNutrients.FAT.quantity)}gr

Total Protein

{Math.round(recipeDetail.totalNutrients.PROCNT.quantity)}gr

Total Weight

{Math.round(recipeDetail.totalWeight)}gr

Ingredient List

    { recipeDetail.ingredientLines.map((item)=>{ return(
  • {item}
    • ) }) }
div.
: null } ) } } export default connect("listRecipe, recipeData", actions)(withRouter(Recipe))
